meanings.sent1: The computer program is restartable after a power outage.
meanings.sent2: The restartable engine allowed the car to quickly get back on the road.
meanings.sent3: The restartable toaster saved breakfast after accidentally burning the toast.
meanings.sent4: Her restartable determination to learn a new language impressed everyone.
meanings.sent5: The restartable battery provided hours of uninterrupted power.

meanings.sent1: The restartable movie paused for a break and resumed seamlessly.
meanings.sent2: The restartable generator kicked in during the blackout.
meanings.sent3: The restartable game allowed players to continue from where they left off.
meanings.sent4: His restartable enthusiasm for the project never wavered.
meanings.sent5: The restartable clock automatically reset after a power cut.
